description: Unique identifier of the asset that this part record is linked to.
Standardized classification of the linked asset, used for reporting and business rules.
Inventory or catalog code identifying the part; aligns with the parts/stock master or SKU.
Number of units of this part associated with the asset in this record.
User ID or system process that created the record.
Date and time the record was created.
User ID that last updated the record.
Date and time the record was last updated.
Most recent work order ID where this part was issued or installed for the asset.
Timestamp when this part was last installed on the asset, per maintenance history.
Likely the warehouse or storeroom code associated with this part for the asset; confirm with SME.
